medical_history.chief_complaint: Sudden onset of epigastric pain radiating to the LUQ.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient had viral-like symptoms over the past several days, including headache, low-grade fever, and sore throat. Today, the patient experienced sudden onset of epigastric pain, which has since radiated to the LUQ. Denies nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, and fever/chills.
medical_history.family_history: Mother with valvular disease and ICD. No history of sudden cardiac death or premature CAD.
